emailsignup.instructions: We won't bother you often, only when we have something amazing to share!
emailsignup.title: Enjoying free stuff?
faq.features.fifth.subtitle: Yes, we have many customization features in the settings. Check them out! Additionally, you can enjoy a free trial of Typewise PRO to try out PRO features yourself.
faq.features.fifth.title: Can I customize my Typewise Keyboard?
faq.features.first.subtitle: We appreciate ideas from our community! You can share your ideas on our suggestion platform or upvote current suggestions. We consider the most upvoted tips while planning the further development of Typewise.
faq.features.first.title: I would like Typewise to add a new feature, what shall I do?
faq.features.fourth.subtitle: Yes, you can with PRO! You even have the possibility to adjust the vibration intensity.
faq.features.fourth.title: Can I enable the vibration of keys?
faq.features.second.subtitle:
We created Text Replacements to simplify and speed up your typing! You could use Text Replacement to shortcut any text (e.g., phrases such as "talk to you later" into "ttyl"). It also works to simplify writing an email or addresses. Adding Text Replacements is one of Typewise's PRO features, and it is simple to activate. Follow these steps:
1. Open the Typewise app
2. Press on settings
3. Select Text Replacements
4. Add Text Replacement
faq.features.second.title: How do I use "Text Replacement"?
faq.features.subtitle: Curious about the full potential of Typewise? Questions and answers around all our features and settings.
faq.features.third.subtitle: You can change the size of the space button in the PRO settings of the Typewise app. Note that this change will not be visible.
faq.features.third.title: Can I increase the size of the space keys to avoid typos?
faq.features.title: Features & Settings
faq.languages.fifth.subtitle: To enable this feature, you need to add the languages you want to use in the settings. When you start typing, Typewise will automatically detect your language from the previously selected languages based on the words you write and will adjust the Autocorrection, as well as the suggested words.
faq.languages.fifth.title: How does "Automatic Language Detection" work?
faq.languages.first.subtitle:
The keyboard will learn the words you type and save them to its offline dictionary automatically! Usually, you need to write a word three times. You might have to minimize the keyboard to process the newly learned words in some cases. 

If you notice a wrong correction, you must undo it by tapping on the Autocorrection notification, which appears on the Smart Bar. That's how Typewise learns what you wanted to type and will improve its Autocorrection.
faq.languages.first.title: How do I add words to the dictionary?
faq.languages.fourth.subtitle: We are working on adding new languages. To help us prioritize which languages to add first, please use our suggestion platform and upvote respective feature request or create a new one.
faq.languages.fourth.title: When will new languages be added?
faq.languages.second.subtitle: Simply press and hold on the main letter that the accent belongs to. For instance, to write an "√©" press and hold on the letter "e." The accents displayed depend on the selected languages. For example, the "√©" appears if you add French as a language. However, if you want access to diacritics that don't belong to one of the selected languages, you can add the desired accents in the settings under "Custom Accents".
faq.languages.second.title: How do I write language accents (e.g., √©)?
faq.languages.subtitle: Answers around languages and the related settings can be found here.
faq.languages.third.subtitle:
At the moment, you can choose from 40+ languages. As a Swiss startup, we focus on Latin languages first. But we are working to support more languages such as Arabic, Chinese, Hebrew, Japanese, Korean, Persian, Russian (and many more) in the future! By the way, with our PRO version, you can type in multiple languages without having to switch manually!
– English (United States, United Kingdom, Australia, Canada)
– Afrikaans
– Albanian
– Basque
– Breton
– Catalan
– Croatian
– Czech
– Danish
– Dutch (Netherlands, Belgium)
– Estonian
– Filipino
– Finnish
– French (France, Canada, Switzerland)
– Galician
– German (Germany, Switzerland, Austria)
– Hinglish
– Hungarian
– Icelandic
– Indonesian
– Irish
– Italian
– Latvian
– Lithuanian
– Malaysian
– Norwegian
– Polish
– Portuguese (Portugal, Brazil)
– Romanian
– Serbian
– Slovak
– Slovene
– Spanish
– Swedish
– Swiss German
– Turkish
faq.languages.third.title: How many languages does Typewise support?
faq.languages.title: Languages
faq.layout.first.subtitle: Deleting is super easy: just quickly swipe to the left on the keyboard without holding to delete a letter. If you swipe and hold, you can delete multiple letters at once by swiping left more. If you deleted too much, you can swipe back right to restore text. In the tutorial, we explain this and other great features.
faq.layout.first.title: How do I delete text?
faq.layout.second.subtitle: You have to simply swipe up on the letter you want to capitalize. Don't tap and hold first. Just instantly swipe up. A few millimeters are enough.
faq.layout.second.title: How do I capitalize letters?
faq.layout.subtitle: Forgot a gesture? Questions about the different layouts or gestures, are answered here.
faq.layout.third.subtitle: According to our users, mastering the keyboard can take between 1 day and a couple of weeks. It might sound like a considerable effort, but most users say that it's worth it, and they don't want to go back to conventional keyboards. Hint: You can use our game to get used to our hexagon layout or start from the traditional layout.
faq.layout.third.title: Is it easy to learn the hexagon layout?
faq.layout.title: Layout & Gestures
faq.privacy.first.subtitle: Yes, Typewise is a keyboard app with full privacy. Unlike other keyboard apps, we do not require any suspicious permissions. No typing data leaves your keyboard. To improve the app, we share specific usage data from the app itself, e.g., from the tutorial, game, or settings. If you don't like that, you can turn on the "Offline Mode" which will switch off any connection. To read more about how we deal with privacy, you can check out this article.
faq.privacy.first.title: Is privacy important for Typewise?
faq.privacy.second.subtitle: Great question! Those are both our apps. Since the beginning, privacy has been our top priority, and Typewise has worked entirely offline. However, specific feature requests such as voice-to-text, dictionary backup, or animated GIFs require internet access. For this reason, we now operate two apps: Typewise Custom Keyboard (with internet access and new features) and Typewise Offline Keyboard (which remains fully offline with no internet access). We always put privacy at the core of both versions and no typing data leaves your keyboard. To improve the app, we share specific usage data from the app itself, e.g., from the tutorial, game, or settings. If you don't like that, you can turn on the "Offline Mode," which will switch off any connection.
faq.privacy.second.title: What is the difference between Typewise Custom Keyboard and Typewise Offline Keyboard?
faq.privacy.subtitle: How does Typewise handle security? Everything about your privacy answered here.
faq.privacy.title: Privacy & Security
faq.pro.fifth.subtitle: Unlike other keyboards, Typewise does not collect or sell your data. We do not show you any ads. To improve and develop‚ÄØTypewise‚ÄØfurther, we offer PRO features through an in-app purchase. But, all the most important features are available in the free version.
faq.pro.fifth.title: Why are some features PRO-only?
faq.pro.first.subtitle: Yes! You can use Typewise for free. Although, more PRO features are available as in-app purchases. Some of our PRO features include typing in multiple languages without switching, personalized Text Predictions, Key Vibration, Text Replacements, additional themes, and much more! Give it a try!
faq.pro.first.title: Can I use Typewise for free?
faq.pro.fourth.subtitle: Great you ask! Those are both our apps. Since the start, privacy has been our top priority, and Typewise has worked entirely offline. However, specific feature requests such as voice-to-text, dictionary backup, or animated GIFs require internet access. For this reason, we now operate two apps: Typewise Custom Keyboard (with internet access and new features) and Typewise Offline Keyboard (which remains fully offline with no internet access). We always put privacy at the core of both versions and no typing data leaves your keyboard. To improve the app, we share specific usage data from the app itself, e.g., from the tutorial, game, or settings. If you don't like that, you can turn on the "Offline Mode," which will switch off any connection.
faq.pro.fourth.title: What is the difference between Typewise Custom Keyboard and Typewise Offline Keyboard?
faq.pro.second.subtitle: PRO version offers additional features that improve your typing experience even more. You can read about the PRO version in more details here
faq.pro.second.title: What does PRO version offer?
faq.pro.subtitle: Confused about Typewise PRO? Questions related to the premium app explained here.
faq.pro.third.subtitle: You can manage your subscription directly in the App Store. Just make sure you are logged in with the right account.
faq.pro.third.title: How do I cancel my subscription?
faq.pro.title: Typewise PRO
faq.title: Looking for help?
faq.what_can_i_do_title: Didn't find what you were looking for? You can reach out to us either through the Telegram community or by writing us an email.

pro.auto_correction:
Swipe down to undo Autocorrection:
Undo Autocorrection by swiping down anywhere on the keyboard. You know what you're typing!
pro.colorful_themes:
Enjoy colorful themes:
Want more themes? Unlock Neon Rainbow, Dark Blue and other 14 colorful themes.
pro.comment.kevin: Kevin: The PRO feature is awesome! Used the app for about a week before I finally gave in and got the PRO version. Totally totally worth it! I like the options for more themes and the vibrate feature
pro.comment.sven: Sven: Finally a really helpful keyboard! Nice tutorial. Nice training game. The important thing is that you read through all settings really quickly, try them out and personalize them according to your own wishes. PRO version is worth a purchase just to support the developers. Thanks a lot!
pro.comment.whaha: Whaha: Potential unlockedüôÇ It's free to try, but buying the pro version is really worth it. My favorite feature: Swipe down to undo autocorrect. Because autocorrect rocks if you can tweak it fast.
pro.got_interested: Interested? Then upgrade to PRO today!
pro.last: Last but not the least: by purchasing Typewise PRO you also support our privacy movement and sponsor new features üôÇ
pro.most_importantly_answer:
With your purchase of Typewise PRO, you continue the fight for privacy and enable new features to be developed. Privacy stands or falls with YOU the user.

Furthermore, you are supporting the Typewise team, and allow us to further provide users all over the world with the best typing experience
pro.personalized:
Get personalized Text Predictions:
Typewise learns your way of typing, and makes even better Text Predictions.
pro.space_button:
Change the size of space buttons:
Space buttons too small for your fingers? Make them bigger!
pro.subtitle: Discover how PRO can help you to improve your typing experience

Activate Key Vibration when pressing a key and adjust its intensity to the level you want.

settings.settings_offlinemode.alert.desc: Offline Mode fully turns off internet access and disables all online features and our limited app tracking for improving the app. Only validating your license may access the internet.
settings.settings_offlinemode.descriptio: Typewise never transmits what you type and our Autocorrection and word completion AI works fully offline. Anonymized app usage data (e.g. tutorial, settings and game) helps us improve the app.
settings.settings_offlinemode.title: Offline Mode
settings.settings_aiassistant.descriptio: Since this feature requires an internet connection, Offline Mode will be disabled. When using this feature, whatever you type is transmitted directly to OpenAI, accompanied by your personal API token. Typewise is not involved in this process.
settings.settings_aiassistant.apikey: You can create and access OpenAI API keys in your OpenAI account:

tutorial.hexagons.description1: Our hexagon layout is based on Fitts' law. Our keys are 70% larger, empowering you to type faster and more accurately.
tutorial.hexagons.description2: The following tutorial uses the hexagon layout. Afterwards you can choose either hexagon or traditional layout.

tutorial.offline.instruction2: You can even activate ¬´Offline Mode¬ª in the settings to turn off collection of anonymous usage data from the tutorial, game and settings.
tutorial.offline.instruction2_offline: With Typewise Offline the entire app has no internet connection. Rest assured that no data ever leaves your device.
tutorial.offline.instruction3_android: Note: Android always displays a warning when a third-party keyboard is activated. With Typewise, you can safely ignore this message since the keyboard has no internet connected and your typing data cannot be transmitted.
tutorial.offline.title: Typewise provides 100% privacy

keyboard.cards.rating.title: Enjoying Typewise?
keyboard.cards.rating.text: If you have been enjoying Typewise, let us know. Your feedback helps us bring Typewise to the next level!
settings.settings_languages.dialect.aler: Only enable this feature if your dialect is a completely different language. Otherwise, it will lead to a decreased performance of the Text Prediction and Autocorrection.
Typewise will additionally learn your specific dialect and start showing you the appropriate Text Predictions and Autocorrections.
keyboard.cards.layout.text_ab1: We recommend using the traditional layout for the first few days in order to get used to our gestures. Try switching the layout now, you can switch back anytime.
push.enable.title: Get Notified!
push.enable.text: Allow Typewise to send you push notifications to help you stay up-to date on secrets, new features and promotions!
push.ptutorial: Hey Captain! Don‚Äôt forget to complete the tutorial to learn all the tricks and tips!
push.pgame: Master the hexagon layout in no time with our game. Try it out now

offlinemode.alert.title: Offline Mode is a PRO feature
offlinemode.alert.text1: Typewise never transmits what you type.
offlinemode.alert.text2: If you don‚Äôt want to share any usage data, you can support us as a PRO user and opt-out completely.
seedrs.banner.title: Want to own shares in Typewise?
seedrs.page.title: Crowdinvesting: become a Typewise shareholder
seedrs.page.text1:
With over 1.2 million downloads already, our next-gen smartphone keyboard is already changing the way people type on their phones. And this is just phase one of our vision to transform human-machine interaction through our privacy-friendly, deep-tech AI.

As a loyal supporter of Typewise we wanted you to be the first to know about our crowdinvesting opportunity. If you want to join our growth story ‚Äì now is your chance to become a Typewise shareholder.

And as a bonus, all new Typewise shareholders will receive an extra goodie üéÅ
seedrs.page.text2: Interested? Learn more on our Seedrs page.
seedrs.disclaimer: Investing in startups involves risks, including loss of capital, illiquidity, lack of dividends and dilution, and it should be done only as part of a diversified portfolio. Seedrs is targeted solely at investors who are sufficiently sophisticated to understand these risks and make their own investment decisions. This message has been approved as a financial promotion by Seedrs Limited which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority.
settings.settings_support.text: If you are experiencing any problems, please fill out the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

push.pthemes: Explore over 18 themes and make the keyboard truly yours!
seedrs.banner.text.v4: Over ‚Ç¨1 million raised. Only few days left!</br><u>Join us too</u>
seedrs.page.title.v4: Crowdinvesting: over ‚Ç¨1m raised. Join us too!
seedrs.page.text1.v4:
Our crowdinvesting campaign has already seen huge popularity and we‚Äôre pleased to announce we‚Äôve raised over ‚Ç¨1 million.

There‚Äôs still time for you to own shares in Typewise but you‚Äôll need to be quick as the campaign is closing soon.

We also offer extra perks to Typewise shareholders. üéÅ
appnomix.banner.title: Don‚Äôt have PRO?
appnomix.banner.text: Thanks to Appnomix, try our PRO features including the AI Assistant for free.
appnomix.page.title: Unlock sponsored PRO features
appnomix.page.text:
Thanks to our partner Appnomix, you can use all of our PRO features for free until the end of December 2025, including our brand-new AI Assistant. Easily switch between tones and languages, and be inspired by spelling and grammar tips as you type.

Plus, get personalized recommendations when you search in the browser to make your shopping experience a breeze. To do this, Appnomix leverages your anonymized search data. Nothing else you type is transmitted.

Since these features require an internet connection, Offline Mode is disabled. The Appnomix integration is optional and can be turned off at any time in the settings.
settings.auto_caps.title: Auto Capitalization
settings.auto_caps.off.hint: Nothing is capitalized unless you swipe up.
settings.auto_caps.full.hint: Automatically capitalize new sentences and proper nouns such as names or cities.

settings.settings_senddebuglog_timestamp: Send your log files to the Typewise developers to help troubleshoot bugs. Please note that the log files contain information about what you have typed.
settings.isGlobeVisible.hint: Select whether the Globe key should be visible or not. On iOS devices without dedicated Home button the keyboard can also be switched via the Smart Bar menu.

modals.unlock_pro.pricingoption1.freeper: Your card will not be charged until the end of the free trial period. After the period of {{ trialdays }} days, the subscription will automatically renew at the predetermined price unless it is canceled before the end of the trial period.
modals.unlock_pro.pricingoption1.nofreep: The subscription can be managed and canceled at any time after purchase through the settings in the {{ storename }}.
modals.unlock_pro.pricingoption1.renewal: The subscription automatically renews at the agreed-upon price if it is not canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.

keyboard.appnomix.amazonattribution: As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases
settings.settings_aiassistant.descriptio: Since this feature requires an internet connection, Offline Mode will be disabled. When using this feature, whatever you type is transmitted directly to OpenAI through a Typewise server. Nothing will be stored.
appnomix.page.alert_denied.title: Allow Tracking for Typewise
appnomix.page.alert_denied.description: Enable it in the iOS settings in order to use PRO and additional online features for free.
appnomix.page.alert_restricted.title: Allow Tracking
appnomix.page.alert_restricted.descripti: Typewise requires tracking permission to offer PRO features for free. To allow tracking, navigate to Settings > Privacy & Security > Tracking > Allow Apps to Request to Track.
appnomix.page.alert_unrestricted.title: Allow Typewise to track your activity across other companies‚Äô apps and websites?
appnomix.page.alert_unrestricted.descrip: This allows Typewise to make your shopping experience a breeze.
keyboard.tracking.banner.one: Allow Tracking to use PRO sponsored by Appnomix
